summary: Defines a comprehensive set of element classes that describe the semantic type of tensors and data structures (e.g., audio signals, image values, scalar numbers, probability distributions, model outputs) used throughout the NeMo framework, enabling typeâ€‘safe model composition and validation.
business_intent: Standardize and enforce type information for neural network inputs, outputs, and intermediate tensors to improve model reliability, interoperability, and developer productivity within the NVIDIA NeMo ecosystem.
